Topic.Title: I was working on a quest game, but then it totally deleted all my progress on the Squiffy game!!!

Posts.EditableText: I was working on a Quest game. I was working on the discription on the Quest game. I wanted to know how to make something  *italic* and **bold**. I did it before on my Squiffy game, so I went to check how to do it. But when I went into the Squiffy game, all of my progress was totally deleted!!! I was back on line *one*!!! I had like, 400 lines!!! Please help!
Posts.HTML: I was working on a Quest game. I was working on the discription on the Quest game. I wanted to know how to make something italic and bold. I did it before on my Squiffy game, so I went to check how to do it. But when I went into the Squiffy game, all of my progress was totally deleted!!! I was back on line one!!! Posts.EditableText:
You might want to bring it to the attention of the admins. Otherwise, I'd advise always working offline. I want to keep track of my own code progress.

I'm really sorry to hear this. Hopefully some of the clever people on this base will have more to add.
